sentence: Teacher said, "The earth moves round the sun."
rule: চিরন্তন সত্য বাক্য সবসময় Simple Present Tense এ হয়।

sentence: The man seldom smokes.
rule: 'Seldom' → frequency adverb, তাই Simple Present Tense। subject singular → verb + s.

sentence: Rabindranath's stories often have surprise endings.
We often fall a victim of circumstances.
rule: fall a victim একটা বাক্যাংশ যা পরিস্থির শিকার অর্থে ব্যবহৃত হয়েছে।

sentence: He has gone out just now.
rule: যেহেতু এটা Present perfect তাই V3 হবে।

sentence: I have not yet drunk the glass of milk.
We have not had a holiday since the beginning of the year.
rule:
অতীতে শুরু হয়েছে এবং এখনো চলমান। had + had = অতীতে নির্ধারিত সময়ের মধ্যে হওয়া।
have + had = অতীতে শুরু হয়েছে কিন্তু তা বর্তমানে চলমান।

sentence: We are good friends. We have known each other for a long time.
rule: have/be/know/see এর present continous হয় না।

sentence: She has been unconscious since four O'clock.
rule: since আছে তাই এটা has + been হবে।

sentence: Naeem has been bored for about a week.
rule: has + been কারণ অতীতে শুরু এখনো চলছে

what did you do last night.

sentence: He came to me that day before yesterday.
He moved to Dhaka just a few minutes ago.
rule: because of "moved" is a V2 form of verb.

sentence: You beat the thief last night.
At four he looked the same as now.
rule: এর কারণ হচ্ছে বাক্যটা অতীতকাল নির্দেশ করতেছে তাই।

sentence: The old man died yesterday.
rule: যেহেতু yesterday অতীতকাল নির্দেশ করতেছে তাই এখানে died হবে।
